title: Preventative Maintenance Plans
subTitle: Increases System Lifespan - Proper maintenance extends the life of your HVAC system
Lowers Utility Bills - A well-maintained system runs more efficiently, reducing energy costs
Prevents Costly Repairs - Routine checkups help detect small issues before they become major problems
Improves Indoor Air Quality - Clean filters, coils, and ductwork mean healthier air for your home
Ensures Year-Round Comfort - No more unexpected breakdowns in extreme weather

starterKit.name: Comfort Shield Plan - 1st System (Basic Maintenance)
features: Inspect Electrical Connections & Tighten as Needed
Test Thermostat for Accuracy & Calibration (If Applicable)
Visually Inspect Ductwork for Airflow Issues
Inspect Condenser Coil & Rinse Off Debris
Transferable Membership If You Move (Same Town)

professionalToolbox.name: Comfort Defender Plan - 1st System (Advanced Maintenance)
features: Flush & Treat Condensate Drain Lines to Prevent Clogs
Test Thermostat for Accuracy & Calibration (If Applicable)
Visually Inspect Ductwork for Airflow Issues
Check Blower Motor & Fan Operation, (Clean If Necessary)
Inspect Condenser Coil & Rinse Off Debris
Inspect & Clean Evaporator Coil (In-Place, Does Not Included Removal If Necessary)
Indoor Air Quality Assessment (Included Humidity & Pollutant Checks)
No Overtime or After-Hours Charges (Excluding Holidays)
Transferable Membership If You Move (Same Town)

enterpriseSuite.name: Comfort Elite Plan - 1st System (Premium Maintenance & Protection)
enterpriseSuite.description: Best for ultimate peace of mind
features: Full Refrigerant Level & Adjustments (If Needed - Up to 1 lb.)
Inspect & Secure All Electrical Wiring & Components.
Check & Inspect Blower Motor & Fan Operation
Gas Leak & Carbon Monoxide Testing (For Gas Furnaces)
Flush & Treat Condensate Drain Lines to Prevent Clogs
Drain Pan Treatment to Prevent Mold & Algae Growth
Full System Deep Cleaning (Interior & Exterior Components)
Test for Proper Air Flow & Temperature Balance
Indoor Air Quality Assessment (Includes Humidity & Pollutant Checks)
Test & Inspect Safety Controls (Battery Replacement in Life Safety Equipment, CO and Fire Alarms).
No Overtime or After-Hours Charges (Excluding Holidays)
Exclusive Discounts On New System Installations
Transferable Membership If You Move (Same Town)
